definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ex 12:48 sojourner (Ar. ja0ra, Eth. gyur: gor: Aram. gyuwr, [[גִּיּוֹר]], prosetlyte, [[גַּיֵּר]] proselytize, Ph. [[גר]] in n.pr., & pl. [[גרם]])—[[גֵּר]] Ge 15:16 + 74 t.; sf. [[גֵּרְךָ]] Ex 20:10 + 4 t., [[גֵּרוֹ]] De 1:16; pl. [[גֵּרִים]] Ex 22:20 + 9 t., [[גֵּירִים]] 2Ch 2:16; —

sojourner, temporary dweller, new-comer (no inherited rights), cf. Ex 12:19, Le 24:16, Nu 15:30, Jos 8:33 (opp. homeborn); of Abraham at Hebron Ge 23:4 (P; ‖[[תּוֹשָׁב]]); Moses in desert Ex 2:22 (J) Ex 18:3 (E; here explan. of name Gershom, Moses' son); as claiming hospitality Job 31:32; perh. in above cases, and certainly in general, with technical sense; fig. of Yahweh Je 14:8; of Israel in Egypt Ge 15:13, Ex 22:20, Ex 23:9 (all JE) Le 19:34 (H) De 10:19, De 23:8; [[גֵּרִים]] with Yahweh Le 25:23 (H) 1Ch 29:15, Ps 39:13 (in all ‖[[תּוֹשָׁב]]) cf. Ps 119:19.

usually of [[גֵּרים]] in Israel 2Sa 1:13 (Amalekite) cf. Jos 8:33, Jos 8:35 (E) Jos 20:9 (P) Is 14:1; dwellers in Israel with certain conceded, not inherited right (cf. RS:OTJC 434; 2nd ed. 342. n.; K 42; Sem 75 f. Sta:Gesch. i.400). The [[גֵּר]] is to share in Sabbath rest Ex 20:10, Ex 23:12 (both JE) De 5:14; otherwise he is have like obligations with Israel Ex 12:19, Ex 12:48, Ex 12:49, Le 16:29 (all P) Le 17:8, Le 17:10, Le 17:12, Le 17:13, Le 17:15, Le 18:26, Le 20:2, Le 22:18, Le 24:16, Le 24:22 (all H) Nu 9:14, Nu 9:14, Nu 15:14, Nu 15:15, Nu 15:15, Nu 15:16, Nu 15:26, Nu 15:29, Nu 15:30, Nu 19:10, Nu 35:15 (all P) Ez Eze 14:7; similar rights De 1:16, Ez Eze 47:22, Eze 47:23; and like privileges De 16:11, De 16:14, De 26:11, De 29:10, De 31:12 cf. 2Ch 30:25; very rarely any distinction made, in obligation Le 25:47, Le 25:47, Le 25:47 (H), in permissible food De 14:21; in future success De 28:43; kindness to [[גֵּר]] frequently enjoined: Le 19:10 (‖[[עָנִי]]), Le 23:22 (‖ id.) Le 19:34 (all H); De 10:18, De 10:19, De 14:29, De 24:19, De 24:20, De 24:21, De 26:12, De 26:13 (all ‖[[יׇתוֹם וְאַלְמָנׇה]]); oppression prohibited Le 19:33 (H) De 24:14; Ex 22:20, Ex 23:9, Ex 23:9 (JE) De 24:17, De 27:19, Je 7:6, Je 22:3, Zec 7:10 (these eight ‖[[יׇתוֹם וְאַלְמָנׇה]]); obj. of care to ´[[י]] Ps 146:9 (‖ id.); charge that [[גֵּר]] has been oppressed Ez Eze 22:7, Mal 3:5 (both ‖ id.); also Ez Eze 22:29 (‖[[עָנִי וְאֶבְווֹן]]), Ps 94:6; cf. also command that a poor brother be treated like [[גֵּר]] i.e. kindly, Le 25:35 ( H). Latest conception somewhat different: [[גֵּר]] 1Ch 22:2, 2Ch 2:16 ([[הַגֵּירִים]]) gathered for hard service; yet cf. 2Ch 30:25. (Oft. c. verb. cogn. Ex 12:48, Ex 12:49, Le 16:29, Le 17:8, Le 17:10, Le 17:12, Le 17:13, Le 18:26, Le 19:33, Le 20:2, Nu 9:14, Nu 15:14, Nu 15:15, Nu 15:16, Nu 15:26, Nu 15:29, Nu 19:10, Jos 20:9, Ez Eze 47:22, Eze 47:23; oft ‖[[תּוֹשָׁב]] Ge 23:4, Le 25:23, Le 25:35, Le 25:47, 1Ch 29:15, Ps 39:13).
